title: I got a RADS problem
body:
Is there anyone can help me???
I got a RADS problem that can't connect to the HTTP server.
I did try many ways to fix but none of it can solve the problem.....
Can someone help me???

replies.body: Most of the time that RADS error means that your patcher is getting blocked by your OS. Sometimes your OS might not recognize a program and block its files from running.  Go through the steps in updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that helps!

Here is what I've tried so far:

Looked for Windows Updates
Restarted Computer
Right Click LoL and 'Run as Admin'
Disable Windows Firewall
Reinstall the LOL
Changed the IPv4 DN4 to 8.8.8.8
Changed the host file
